name: FearFall
description:
FearFall is a 2.5D platforming/puzzle game where the player journeys through a deep dark cave full of spiders and magical crystals. The player will have to overcome their fear of the dark and spiders to complete the light puzzles and platforming sections to make it out of this nightmare. 

Credits

 Animation

Joseph Catney, Alisa Kamari, Danielle Thompson, Rachael Lowry

3D Models/Textures 

Adam Beattie, Joseph Catney, Alisa Kamari, Danielle Thompson, Rachael Lowry

Game Designer/Gameplay Scripter 

Eoin Peel

Level Designer 

Matthew Gibson
